dishes.description: Rich and creamy curry made with tender chicken pieces in a tomato-based sauce with butter and cream
Fresh spinach curry with cubes of cottage cheese, spiced with garam masala
Fragrant basmati rice cooked with aromatic spices, herbs, and meat or vegetables
Creamy black lentils simmered overnight with rich spices and cream
Spicy chickpea curry served with deep-fried bread
Traditional Indian bread baked in clay oven, brushed with butter
Deep-fried vegetable and paneer dumplings in a creamy, mild curry sauce
Crispy rice and lentil crepe filled with spiced potato filling
Deep-fried milk solids soaked in sugar syrup, a classic Indian dessert
Marinated and grilled cottage cheese with bell peppers and onions
